code: @Manual{,   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.7623630},   title = {vicinity: Model Spatial Attributes with Ready4},   author = {Matthew Hamilton  [aut, cre] ()},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9218},   url = {https://ready4-dev.github.io/vicinity/}, }

title: Model Spatial Attributes with Ready4
text: Tools developing geospatial models use ready4 youth mental health systems model (https://ready4-dev.github.io/ready4/). development version vicinity package made available part process testing documenting package. currently highly unstable yet recommended use. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au). install development version software, run following commands R console:

title: VicinityLookup — VicinityLookup-class
text: Look tables spatiotemporal data

title: VicinityLookup — VicinityLookup-class
text: vicinity_abbreviations_r3 Vicinity abbreviations (ready4 S3) vicinity_raw_r3 Vicinity raw (ready4 S3) vicinity_processed_r3 Vicinity processed (ready4 S3) vicinity_resolutions_r3 Vicinity resolutions (ready4 S3) vicinity_points_r3 Vicinity points (ready4 S3) vicinity_template_r3 Vicinity template (ready4 S3) vicinity_identifiers_r3 Vicinity identifiers (ready4 S3)

text: Spatiotemporal environment

what: vicinity: Model Spatial Attributes with Ready4 — vicinity-package
title: vicinity: Model Spatial Attributes with Ready4 — vicinity-package
text: Tools developing geospatial models use ready4 youth mental health systems model (https://ready4-dev.github.io/ready4/). development version vicinity package made available part process testing documenting package. currently highly unstable yet recommended use. questions, please contact authors (matthew.hamilton@orygen.org.au).
